sources.title: Sting of Death (TV-1955) BORIS KARLOFF
sources.description:
The Elgin Hour, Season 1 Episode 11
Stars: Boris Karloff, Robert Flemyng, Hermione Gingold
Director: Daniel Petrie

In rural England, a college professor teams with an elderly neighbor to investigate an outbreak of KILLER BEES. 

The Elgin Hour (sponsored by Elgin National Watch Company) was a 60-minute live American anthology TV show that aired from October 5, 1954 to June 14, 1955, for a total of 19 episodes. 

TRIVIA: Although Karloff''s character is named Mr. Mycroft, Sherlockians have recognized a retired Holmes (bee culture, investigating methods, pipe smoking). The episode is based on H. F. Heard's novel "A Taste for Honey."
